channel.title: PHP Unsafe Functions on 4wayhandshake

item.title: POP Restaurant
item.description:
INTRODUCTION

POP Restaurant, by @khanhhnahk1, is an excellent demonstration of why secure coding practices are important. As is hinted by the name, we utilize a PHP POP chain to execute arbitrary PHP on the target.

FIRST TAKE

😍 This UI is adorbs.

It’s a PHP-based web app. Besides the database interfacing code, everything looks like it’s entirely custom.

We can register a user, then start placing “orders” to the restaurant. We can order pizza, icecream, or spaghetti. Once we click one of the order buttons, our order appears in the pane below:
